oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Kris Kristofferson - 2007-08-15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Kris Kristofferson in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on August 8, 2007
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Vocal and guitar with occasional harmonica only. Performances include "Stranger" -- "How Do You Feel About Foolin' Around" -- "Enough For You" -- "Good Love" -- "Daddy's Song" -- "Last Time" -- "From The Bottle To The Bottom" - "Love Don't Live Here Anymore" - "Billy Dee" -- "Sugar Man" -- "The Junkie And The Juicehead" -- "When I Loved Her" -- "Me And Bobby McGee" -- intermission -- "Sam's Song" -- "The Sabre And The Rose" -- "Golden Idol" -- "Once More With Feeling" -- "Your Time's Coming" -- "If It's All The Same To You" -- "Burden Of Freedom" -- "They Killed Him" -- "Sandinista" -- "Anthem '84" -- "Hero" - "Love Is The Way" -- "Sunday Morning Comin' Down" -- encore intermission -- "Thank You For A Life" -- "Circle" -- "Why Me, Lord"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Kristofferson, Kris; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
